name: Hearth Cat
description:
Welcome to Hearth Cat, an early in-development indie game about a little witch cat in a big world.

We’re excited to share this first look at one of the early mini-games you’ll encounter on your adventures through the Vast. At the Charm Workbench, you’ll be able to assemble magical charms for a variety of quests as well as to sell them to earn an extra button or two. From seashells to fish bones, use any number of odd and quirky materials to make your own creations and create the charm that speaks to your heart.
